blocks.text:
Traffic:
- Writes: 20k QPS peak (campaign spikes), Reads: 2M QPS peak (global)
- Token length 7 (62^7 ≈ 3.5e12 space)
- Hot cache for redirects with TTL≈24h; origin DB as source of truth.
Security/abuse:
- Per-IP and per-account rate limits
- Malware/blacklist checks async (quarantine on signal)
- No PII stored with links by default
